title: Why Is Nintendo So Weird?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.27.21
description:
More than TWO YEARS LATER, Super Mario Party is getting DLC. Wut? Gary Whitta and Greg discuss.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:55 - Housekeeping

MCU In Review has returned to rank Falcon and the Winter Soldier!

We’re live reacting to the PlayStation State of Play Thursday at 2 pm PT

The Roper Report -
00:08:20 - Why is Nintendo SO Weird?
00:09:35 - “Are they just now revisiting their highly requested Switch games NOW for some big upcoming update for Online?” - The Nano Biologist
00:20:10 - Monster Hunter Updates
00:36:10 - Use Your DualSense or Xbox controller on iOS
00:42:34 - Ads
00:48:26 - THE YOSH’s New Job
00:59:07 - Out today
01:02:06 - Squad Up: Cambosa - Switch - SW-6828-8679-9851
01:03:13 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing & Tim
